Important Announcements
Welcome to Our North Charleston, SC Hotel! 
Welcome to our hotel near Park Circle in North Charleston, SC. We offer 24-hour shuttle service to Charleston International Airport. Enjoy free parking and shuttle access to the Charleston Area Convention Center and North Charleston Coliseum. We’re less than a mile from the convention center and coliseum and just a short drive to Park Circle, Tanger Outlets, and Topgolf.

Enjoy a hot Express Start® Breakfast with eggs, sausage, and made-to-order pancakes. Relax onsite with an indoor pool, hot tub, fitness center, and patio.

For business, use our 24-hour business center or meeting space for up to 45 guests. After a full day, unwind in your room with plush bedding, a microwave, and a mini-fridge. We’re here to make your North Charleston stay great.

Meetings & Events

Our 725-square-foot Dreamliner Suite is the perfect venue to connect, collaborate, and celebrate with up to 45 guests. Near Charleston International Airport and with our convenient free airport shuttle, we are the ideal location. You are welcome to bring in outside catering; we also provide recommendations for local catering options if needed.
Learn more 
Hassle-Free-Free Parking

Enjoy the convenience of hassle-free parking at our hotel with complimentary guest parking. Stay with us and don’t worry about driving around to find a parking space or incurring high parking fees. Simply park your car and relax, knowing it's easily accessible throughout your stay.
Learn more 
Indoor Pool, Hot Tub, & Outdoor Patio

Take a dip in our inviting indoor heated pool from 6:00 AM – 10:00 PM daily. With natural lighting and lounge chairs, our pool area is the perfect place to relax, swim laps, and make a splash. Unwind with a soothing soak in our hot tub, or soak in the sun on our connecting outdoor patio.
Learn more 
Free Breakfast Buffet

Fuel your day with our complimentary Express Start™ Breakfast buffet from 6:00 AM – 10:00 AM. Enjoy hot and cold selections like classic scrambled eggs and bacon, pancakes, signature cinnamon rolls, cereal, yogurt, and fruit. Complement the most important meal of the day with a freshly brewed cup of coffee.
Learn more 
Prime Location

Our prime location offers unparalleled convenience. Enjoy free shuttle to local attractions like the North Charleston Coliseum & Performing Arts Center. Shop at the Tanger Outlets, experience the fun at Top Golf within walking distance, & enjoy the vibrant dining scene of Park Circle. Our central location puts you near the best of North Charleston.

FAQs for Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area
Does Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area have a pool? 
Yes, Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area has an indoor pool.
How much is parking at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area? 
Complimentary parking is available at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area for hotel guests.
Can I bring my pet to Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area? 
No, pets are not allowed at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area.
Does Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area offer free airport shuttle service? 
Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area offers free shuttle service from Charleston International Airport (CHS). Exit baggage claim, cross to the center median, turn right and walk past the final crosswalk.
How far is Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area from the airport? 
Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area is 2 mi from Charleston International Airport (CHS) and is 19 mi from Charleston Executive Airport (JZI).
Can I cancel my booking at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area for a full refund? 
Always check the hotel's cancellation policy before booking a rate. Room cancellation is subject to rate booked at time of reservation and cancellation policy varies by rate.
Does Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area have a restaurant on site? 
No, there is no on site restaurant at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area.
Is there free breakfast available at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area? 
Breakfast is free with your stay at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area.
When is breakfast at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area? 
Breakfast at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area is available from 6:00 AM to 10:00 AM.
Is there a complimentary shuttle available at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area? 
Yes, Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area offers a complimentary local area shuttle. Check our for more details.
Transportation page What are the check-in and check-out times for Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area? 
Check-in at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area is from 3:00 PM, and check-out time is 11:00 AM. Contact the hotel directly for options available for early check-in or late check-out.
Does Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area offer free Wi-Fi? 
Yes, the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Arpt-Conv Ctr Area offers free WiFi!
